alert.note: Alert for Craighead (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 1:25PM CST until January 11 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Arkansas... Saint Francis River at Lake City For the Saint Francis River...including Saint Francis, Lake City, Madison...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saint Francis River at Lake City. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Flooding is occurring in the swamps along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM CST Sunday the stage was 9.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 10.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall to 8.9 feet and begin rising again Thursday morning. It will rise to 9.0 feet Thursday evening. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.0 feet on 12/05/1993. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
